disketaa_rim_inline.name: Rim inline
disketaa_rim_inline.description: Creates a rim light effect that illuminates the edges within a cone.

rim_color.name: Color
rim_color.desc: Sets the color of the rim inline effect.

opacity.name: Opacity
opacity.desc: Controls the overall visibility of the rim inline effect.

blending.name: Blending
blending.desc: Controls the mix between normal and additive color blending.

threshold.name: Threshold
threshold.desc: Controls which colors are affected by the rim effect based on brightness.

angle.name: Angle
angle.desc: Sets the direction angle for the rim inline effect in degrees.

cone.name: Cone
cone.desc: Controls the angular spread of the rim light in degrees.

amount.name: Amount
amount.desc: Controls the thickness of the rim inline effect in pixels.

sharpness.name: Sharpness
sharpness.desc: Controls the hardness of the rim inline effect.
